sentences.english: The Government has indefinitely deferred the Tamar development project.
sentences.chinese: 政府决定无限期押后添马舰的发展工程。

sentences.english: No offence meant, but I think the activity should be postponed.
sentences.chinese: 我无意冒犯，但我认为这活动应押后。
